data.oai_dc:dc: This .csv file contains a list of all known individuals (“Band”). For each individual, other variables are – “Cohort”: breeding season (cohort) in which individuals were hatched. “Surv1yr”: whether or not they survived their first winter. “F”: individual inbreeding coefficient. “H”: standardised multilocus heterozygosity, calculated using R package ‘Rhh’ (“NA” indicates values that cannot be calculated due to insufficient genotyping data). “Rbm” and “Rwm”: relatedness coefficient to “blue-metal” and “white-metal”. Genotypes for each of the seven TLR loci (missing data are blanks) are also provided.
